errors.channelNameDuplicate: Channel with name {{ channelName }} already exists

conversationMessages.searchBarPlaceholder: Search for a message within the current conversation

archiveChannel.title: Archive Channel {{ channelName }} ?
archiveChannel.question: Do you really want to archive the channel {{ channelName }} ?
archiveChannel.description: No one will be able to send messages to the channel. You can unarchive the channel at any time.

unArchiveChannel.title: Unarchive Channel {{ channelName }} ?
unArchiveChannel.question: Do you really want to unarchive the channel {{ channelName }} ?
unArchiveChannel.description: Unarchiving a channel will allow members to post. You can archive the channel again at any time.

deleteChannel.question: Are you sure to delete the channel with name '{{ title }}'? This is a permanent action and cannot be undone.
deleteChannel.confirm: Please enter the title of the channel to confirm.

grantChannelAdmin.title: Make {{ userName }} an admin of {{ channelName }} ?
grantChannelAdmin.question: Do you really want to make {{ userName }} an admin of {{ channelName }} ?
grantChannelAdmin.description: This will allow {{ userName }} to manage the channel and its members.

revokeChannelAdmin.title: Revoke admin rights of {{ userName }} in {{ channelName }} ?
revokeChannelAdmin.question: Do you really want to revoke the admin rights of {{ userName }} in {{ channelName }} ?
revokeChannelAdmin.description: This will revoke the admin rights of {{ userName }} in {{ channelName }}. You can grant the admin rights again at any time.

removeUserPrivateChannel.title: Remove user from private channel?
removeUserPrivateChannel.question: Remove {{ userName }} from private channel {{ channelName }} ?
removeUserPrivateChannel.warning: This member will not be able to access this channel anymore unless he/she is invited again.

removeUserPublicChannel.title: Remove user from public channel?
removeUserPublicChannel.question: Remove {{ userName }} from public channel {{ channelName }} ?
removeUserPublicChannel.warning: This member will not be able to access this channel anymore unless he/she joins again.

removeUserGroupChat.title: Remove user from group chat?
removeUserGroupChat.question: Remove {{ userName }} from group chat?
removeUserGroupChat.warning: This member will not be able to access this group chat anymore unless he/she is invited again.

memberRow.channelAdminTooltip: Channel Admin that can manage the channel and its members

addUsersForm.requiredError: You must select at least one user
addUsersForm.maxError: You can only add {{ max }} users
addUsersForm.addUserLabel: Search for users in the course
addUsersForm.maxUsersNote: Note: You can only add {{ max }} users to this conversation

createOneToOneChat.title: Start a direct conversation with another user
createOneToOneChat.userSelectorLabel: Select a user to chat with

createGroupChat.title: Start a group chat between you and a maximum of 9 other users
createGroupChat.userSelectorLabel: Search for users to add to the group chat
createGroupChat.requiredError: You must select at least one user
createGroupChat.maxError: You can only add {{ max }} users

topicInput.label: Topic (optional)
topicInput.topicHelp: What is the channel currently dealing with? (Displayed in header)
topicInput.maxLengthValidationError: The topic can be a maximum of {{ max }} characters long!

createChannel.description: A channel is a way to group people together around a project, a topic, or just for fun. You can create as many channels as you want.

nameInput.label: Name
nameInput.maxLengthValidationError: Name can be max {{ max }} characters long!
nameInput.regexValidationError: Names can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes.

descriptionInput.label: Description (optional)
descriptionInput.maxLengthValidationError: Description can be max {{ max }} characters long!

isPublicInput.label: Private Channel / Public Channel
isPublicInput.explanation: People will need an invitation to join a private channel. Everybody can join a public channel.
